page.title: 13PUBLIC ATTITUDES TO THE AREA
page.content: outside your home.The noise factor is also a nuisance particularly late at night with car doors slamming,car radios blaring and people shouting to each other. {View 2}There are a variety of shops that cater for everyone's needs.I don't think anymore shops,especially larger ones, would suit the area.Most of the present shops are family owned which gives a friendly atmosphere. A small leisure centre would be a useful asset to the area especially for older children who tend to wander the streets at night with nothing to do and feeling bored with life Crossland Park has deteriorated over recent years.It has been abused by older children and, as it is only a small park,it is not really viable to have a park keeper. {View 3 }I think that there could be a
